page.title: 15Animal Welfare on Dartmoor.
page.content: Long ago in 1911 animals were not treated very well.People could be cruel to animals but nothing would be done,but now if somebody is cruel they would be prosecuted.Today it is not illegal to hunt animals with dogs,but it probably will be one day.It is illegal to kill or be cruel to{Badgers and to set traps for certain other animals.Now if an animal has a broken leg and it is reported to the { {R.S.P.C.A.}they will probably come to the case straight away.If it is not very serious the{Royal Society for {Prevention of Cruelty to Animals}will contact the owner of the animal.At the moment animals like mink or otter are quite rare because people have hunted them for a long time.
